attributes.action: Stop allowing housing companies to build houses/flats/apartments on areas which are already over populated and over polluted.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If this happens, the PM may find that the congestion in large cities such as Leeds and London will not worsen as the Government predicts, as there will be less housing, therefore leading to less people in the cities, and eventually culminating in less cars on the road and pollution.  It will also make these areas safer and more welcoming, as there will be less cars and crime than they now expect, and people who live there already will be able to get on with normal, uninterrupted routines instead of the hectic lifestyle that has becoome accepted as the "norm."
